workouts.name: triple threat
workouts.description: Using a barbell, lay on your back on a bench and do 10 skullcrushers, 10 close grip chest press, and 10 overhead tricep extensions. Repeat with a set of 7, then a set of 4. This should kill.

workouts.name: rope pulldown
workouts.description: Attach a rope grip to the pulleys and pull down on the rope in front of you. Do a set of as many as you can, then turn and pull the rope like you're doin a tricep extension. Repeat 3 sets for each.

workouts.name: tricep dips
workouts.description: Try to stay vertical, don't lean too far forward. 3 sets.

workouts.name: dumbell chest press
workouts.description: Just a bench press, but using dumbells. Do 4 sets, heavy weight.

workouts.name: dumbell chest fly
workouts.description: 3 sets of as many as you can do with lower weight

workouts.name: incline dumbell bench press
workouts.description: Same as the regular version but on an incline

workouts.name: bicep curl
workouts.description: A classic, standing, dumbell curl. As many sets as you want.

workouts.name: preacher barbell curl
workouts.description: Use a barbell over the preacher equipment, or dumbells over the back of a bench. 3 sets.

workouts.name: seated lean-back curl
workouts.description: Sit back on an incline bench, let your arms hang straight down at the bottom of each curl. 3 sets.

workouts.name: barbell curl
workouts.description: Same as a regular curl but with a barbell. 3 sets.

workouts.name: bent over curl
workouts.description: Bend forward, and curl the dumbell up to your chest, like you're picking it up off the ground. One arm at a time.

workouts.name: hammer curl
workouts.description: Hold each dumbell like a hammer, do a curl. Start heavy weights, do as many as you can, then drop weight til your arms can't go on.

workouts.name: seated row
workouts.description: Start heavy, pull back like you're rowing. 4 sets.

workouts.name: lat pulldown
workouts.description: Start at your body weight, do 1 set wide grip, one set middle, one set close grip. Lower the weight and repeat 2 more cycles (9 sets total).

workouts.name: bent over back fly
workouts.description: Use light weights, bend forward at the waist, let your arms hang, then spread your arms like you're a big eagle. 3 sets.

workouts.name: pull-ups
workouts.description: Wide grip, middle grip, close grip, repeat.

workouts.name: lawn-mower pulls
workouts.description: One knee on the bench, the other leg out for stability. One hand on the bench, the other pulling the weight up towards your torso. 3 sets.

workouts.name: shoulder dumbell press
workouts.description: Sitting in a chair, press over your head. 4 sets.

workouts.name: plate raises
workouts.description: Take two 10 plates. Keeping arms straight, raise them to either side, all the way up over your head, then lower back down. 3 sets.

workouts.name: shoulder flys
workouts.description: Use light weights. ELbows at 45 degrees, hold like ski-poles, then do chicken wings, then hands in the air, then elbows together. Reverse. 3 sets.

workouts.name: standing row
workouts.description: Row with a barbell, standing straight up. 3 sets.

workouts.name: shrugs
workouts.description: Grab as heavy of dumbells as you can hold. Shrug. 3 sets.

workouts.name: ball plank
workouts.description: Plank with your elbows on an exercise ball. Try for three minutes.

workouts.name: crunches
workouts.description: Regular crunches. Only your shoulders need to come off the matt. Keep you legs at 45 degrees. 2 minutes.

workouts.name: reverse crunches
workouts.description: Crunches, but raising your butt instead of your shoulders. 2 minutes.

workouts.name: flutter kicks
workouts.description: Like yoshi. 1 minute.

workouts.name: scissor kicks
workouts.description: Cross those legs in the air. 1 minute.

workouts.name: russian twists
workouts.description: Use a weight that isn't too heavy, stay balanced on your butt, legs up, twist back and forth.

workouts.name: the crucifix
workouts.description: Find a decline bench. Hold a weighted bar behind your head like you're using it for a squat. Curl up. 3 sets of 12.

workouts.name: back squat
workouts.description: Keep that butt out, core tight, back straight. 4 sets.

workouts.name: deadlift
workouts.description: Back straight, core tight. 4 sets.

workouts.name: calf raises
workouts.description: On the leg press machine. 4 sets of 25.

workouts.name: IT band raises
workouts.description: Lay on one side. 30 sec high knees, 30 sec butt kicks, 30 seconds little circles, 30 seconds big circles. Switch sides.

workouts.name: short run
workouts.description: 1-4 miles, push the pace.

workouts.name: long run
workouts.description: 5-12 miles, nice and easy.

workouts.name: box jumps
workouts.description: Start low then stack the boxes higher and higher. Do both legs, then one leg at a time.

workouts.name: medicine ball smash
workouts.description: Lift a medicine ball high over your head and throw it straight down at the ground as hard as you can. 3 sets of 15.

workouts.name: medicine ball throw
workouts.description: Throw the medicine ball up as high as you can against the wall. Let it drop and pick it up. 3 sets of 15.

workouts.name: medicine ball leap
workouts.description: Hold the medicine ball close to your chest, leap as far as you can with it for 6 jumps, then 6 jumps back. 3 sets.
